activities: Paragon provides global outsource management of corporate relocation services. As such, Paragon will receive personal identifiable data from transferring families, which is then passed on to third party service providers to complete the services required to get them moved from their origin location to destination location, such as visa/work permit  applications, property leasing, etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Accounting Services - (ACT)Employment Services - (EMP)Transportation Srvs (Except Aviation) - (TRN)General Services - (GSV)
personaldata: Customer PII --name, address, telephone, email, salary, family information, etc, is housed by our server located in Texas and accessed by our offices around the world. Our privacy protocol also covers the handling of manually processed data (hard copy files, etc.).
privacyprograms: Paragon utilizes TRUSTe as a third party verification program
recoursemech: If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy policy or practices, please contact us at privacy@paragonrelocation.com. If you are not satisfied with our response you can contact TRUSTe here (http://watchdog.truste.com/pvr.php?page=complaint).
